sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>Add boost dice per rank of Blooded to all checks to resist or recover from the effects of poisons, venoms, and other toxins. Reduce the duration of any related ongoing effects or damage from toxins, venoms, or poisons by one round per rank of blooded to a minimum of one.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Blooded</name> <number>TAL0001161</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-13 19:38:00</sys_created_on> <sys_id>15f5ec962fbfd090e0f497eef699b620</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-13 19:38:00</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
